Name: The Misadventure Of Melon
About the game: STORY Join Melon & his buddy Dug in this Misadventure that takes him through 6 amazing chapters, Snow, Caves, Forest, Swamp, Mountains and Corrupted lands to battle through corrupted creatures and to make your way back to the village and save the world from this evil! GAMEPLAY An old school side scrolling beat em up adventure game filled with plenty of secrets, power ups, collectibles, puzzles platforming and of course a lot of Fighting! 6 Chapters Over 30 hats 6 Secret collectibles 5 bonus levels Challenging bosses and mini bosses Loads of upgrades CONTROLS Move: 'ARROW KEYS' Light Attack: 'A' Hard Attack: 'S' Extra/Use: 'D' Jump: 'SPACEBAR'
